revised_title: A Coal-Dust Explosion in Altoft's Colliery
tldr: This article investigates a coal-dust explosion in Altoft's Colliery, near Normanton, Yorkshire, caused by blasting near the faces of the working area. The explosion resulted in significant damage to the intake airways and the destruction of empty coal tubs. The author highlights the importance of proper ventilation and the absence of fire-damp in preventing such accidents.
